attributes.action: 'None of the Above' Ballot paper option
attributes.additional_details:
Change in ballot paper to include a 'None of the Above' option. Voting to remain non-compulsory, but those who are concerned with politics but disagree with all the political parties agendas will be able to officially vote 'None of the Above.'
In the instance of a 'None of the Above'  vote being victorious in a constituency, the runner-up in the election will be made MP (as a 'None of the Above' vote means that those who vote it haven't actually chosen a representative).
